Stutsman to despatch... Edna! Pick up the radio... What the hell... STUTSMAN unlocks his shot gun and exits the vehicle as it rolls to a stop in front of the VFW Legion Hall.

The street is deserted. Flyers plastered on the hall door read: "ONE NIGHT ONLY DR. DIABOLICUS AND THE DIAMOND DEAD STUTSMAN enters the heavily vandalized hall. He shines hi flashlight at an obviously dead the figure on the floor. On a hill some distance away a bonfire is burning. A skin hand taps him on the shoulder and he turns in fright. It belongs to EDNA his dispatcher, late fifties grey hair. S is topless.
You missed a great show Sheriff.
Edna? What's going on here?
Pretty neat huh? (CONTINUED)
Where's my deputies?
They went after the band. Silly really. They chased them out of town up, Packer Rd.

TwO DEPUTIES run for their lives, fleeing an as yet unsee danger. A DARK SHADOW with glowing red eyes watches the m run past and laughs quietly to himself. A second DARK SHA also with red eyes leaps past the first shape pursuing th terrified men. Up in a tree, a third SHADOW FIGURE leaps from his perch the roof of a tomb, then to the ground, crouching like a gargoyle. He growls in rage and sets off in pursuit. The TWO TERRIFIED MEN come to a clearing and stop, uncert which way to turn as the three menacing specters approach them from all sides. A clawed hand slashes downward in a vicious tearing arc. FIRST MAN screams as his as his throat is slashed. Blood squirts out in an arc. In shock the man covers the wound the bleeding stops. Surprised the man removes his hand an the gush of blood resumes. The SECOND MAN turns to look a comes face to face with a FANGED MOUTH. The FOUR FIGURES the TWO MEN to the ground like a pack of hyenas and begin tearing at them feverishly.

ARIA DE WINTER stands on the roof of a tomb overlooking t cemetery. She's carrying an electric guitar and a pig-nos portable amp. She looks around, turns on the amp and laun into a grinding guitar solo, silhouetted against the moon The shadow creatures crouch over their fresh kill. They l their heads looking for the source of the music. The larg of the monsters stands up and roars at the sky. The other follow suit. They stand and walk towards the music. ARIA plays as the four wraiths crawl up the sides of the toward her. She stops playing as the monsters gain footin on the roof.
(peeved) Time to go. (CONTINUED)
The four creatures look at one another and back at ARIA. SONG: "DEATH ROCKS": ARIA AND THE BAND.

The MARQUEE READS: "Dr. Diabolicus and the Diamond Dead." lobby lights turn off, then the signs, and finally the marquee lights. A few blocks away FOG rolls in eerily lit with blue light Inside the fog, LIGHTNING FLASHES, and there is a BRIGHT EXPLOSION. The THICK FOG rolls past the theatre as MATHIA locks the front doors for the night.

Fog. Cool. MATHIAS stands in front of the theatre, turns around and looks up at the marquee proudly. He shoves his hands in t pockets of his leather jacket, steps backwards a few feet into the street and smiles.

I own a theater. Life rocks! The street is deserted and quiet. All we HEAR is the buzz the power lines and the neon in the marquee sign. Then somewhere in the fog MATHIAS hears the sound of souped-up engines. They becomes louder. MATHIAS stares into the fog he can't make out anything. High on a pole, a transformer explodes sending an electri surge down the street. A street light explodes and goes d and then another and another.

What the hell? A ball of electricity builds around a junction box formin outline of a winged demon. It leaps from the junction box streaks past MATHIAS, almost knocking him over. It's unearthly feed-back scream echoes down the street. MATHIA turns around but sees nothing.
Holy shit!
Mathias Stark? (CONTINUED)
MATHIAS turns around. A BEAUTIFUL WOMAN is standing in fr of him. She's a blonde in her mid-twenties with a siniste smile on her face. She wears a top hat with a veil and a black rubber dress.
Yaah!
Did I scare you?
Yes. Jesus Christ.
Good. I'm Aria De Winter
You're with the band, right?
No. They're with me.
Do you hear 429 engines with headers, fuel injectors and two inch straight pipes? Cuz I do.

That's the road crew. Out of the fog come FOUR CUSTOMIZED HEARSES. The DRIVERS dressed in nineteenth century costume. They stop in front the theatre and wait, unmoving. There is a sound that fol and reverberates of powerful turbines humming.
Awesome.
Isn't it...
Your agent said you'd be here tomorrow.
It is tomorrow -- three past twelve.
I'm sorry. I was just going home. (CONTINUED)
A TALL GAUNT MAN walks up to ARIA, his arms outstretched. holds a scythe on a purple satin pillow.
Thank-you, Rasputin. I'll catch up later. She takes the scythe. The man bows slightly and walks awa
I bet you're a terribly fascinating little boy, Mathias. Kinda sexy in an innocent sort of white meat way. Do you have any tattoos?
No.
Do you want one?
I don't know, I...
Shame. Aria twirls the scythe like a baton.
Would it be alright if we went inside and started setting up?
Sure. I'll open up for you.
Don't bother. We got it. The transformer over-head explodes sending a surge along wire down to the theatre. The lobby lights turn themselve on, then the sign and the marquee.
Hey! How'd you do that?
Magic. We're in show business.
Wow. (CONTINUED)
C'mon. Let's you and me get a cup of coffee down the street and leave the boys to the grunt work. ARIA tucks her arm around MATHIAS and leads him down the street.
You're kinda small, aren't ya? Kind of feminine features.
Well, I...
Don't worry. I like girls, too.
I think I'm in over my head.
Not yet, but if you're lucky, who knows?
Help.

ARIA and MATHIAS walk down the street. The telephone wire becomes a pulse of electricity as it flashes through cabl and wires running under the city, into an urban apartment building, follows a chord into the back of a television s into JACK and GEENA'S apartment.

JACK and GEENA are in their living room. JACK is a young in his mid-twenties: Mohawk, shredded clothes, ridiculous features. Just plain odd. GEENA is his roommate: young, beautiful and full of hell with long dark hair and mischievous eyes. They are sitting in front of the TV loo catatonic, watching an infomercial.
What do you wanna do?
I don't know. What do you wanna do? A long silence falls between them. (CONTINUED)
We could eat some food.
Again? We ate already.
That was yesterday.
Really...D'you think I'm anorexic or sumthin?
Where do you wanna eat?
I dunno. Where do you wanna eat? Again, a long silence.
Seven-eleven.
They won't let us in there, remember. You threw up on the clerk.
Oh yeah. Wasn't my fault.
How bout the Mud Club?
Oh gag.
Jacks Diner?
Barf!
Satyr?
Puke.
Leo's (CONTINUED)
Spew!
Well, where do you wanna eat then?
I don't care. Where do you wanna eat? Long silence.
Let's just take a walk and we can figure it out later.
Okay. Neither of them stand up. They continue to stare at the T
C'mon.
I can't. The radiation from the TV has drained my will to resist its electronic seduction. I have no will of my own. Turn it off.
I can't. You turn it off.
Oh, God. We're doomed.
Victims of a technology we cannot control. Jack reaches over the side of the couch and grabs a shoe.
If I can... just.. reach.. my shoe. I can... Ugh! He throws the shoe. It hits the off button on the TV.
Thank God. (CONTINUED)
That was close. We gotta find that remote.
No shit.
JACK and GEENA walk down the street. Suddenly Jack stops front of a telephone pole.
Hey Geena, check it out.
What? On the pole is a POSTER for Dr. Diabolicus and the Diamon Dead.
Dr. Diabolicus is coming. They kick some serious ass.
Looks like a dirt head metal poser band to me. I thought you hated Heavy Metal.
Dr. D isn't Heavy Metal. They're a... they're a hard-core grunge wave rockabillie band. Yeah, a kinda techno dance neuromantic retro glam hip hop be bop slamarama mosh squash. C'mon, you know.
They look like a Metal band.
Yeah, well... they are, but they're good. Can we go? Huh? Can we? Huh? Please, Geena? Please?
Your white trash is showing, Jack.
It is? I'm sorry. We gotta go, Geena. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
They don't do many shows and they'll never breeze through this backwater shitpile again in my lifetime. Please. Please.
Fine. We can go.
Really?
Sure.
Let's get in line for tickets!
It's one o'clock in the morning, Jack. The box office won't open until noon.
Yeah, you're right. We need sleeping bags and shit. You go get the supplies and I'll save you a spot.
I really don't think there's going to be a line.
Are you sure?
Pretty damn sure.
I wanna be absolutely sure.
Oh, God.
That's right, Geena. To the theatre, my trusty sidekick.
I ain't no sidekick and you're no Batman. (CONTINUED)
You're right, little buddy. Let's go tell Ginger and the Professor that Marianne is a lesbian. Hurry!
Asshole.
I prefer to think of myself as anally challenged.
A seedy run down dive. The neon sign explodes leaving onl few glowing letters. The sign now reads Jack off Shop.
MATHIAS and ARIA are having a cup of coffee.
You look nervous.
I'm not nervous. I always look this way in case something weird happens.
Have you ever seen a Diamond Dead show before?
No. But I heard a song or two....0k, that's a lie, I never heard of you guys until your agent called last week. Don't hate me.
So you're saying the only reason we're booked is because we called first.

I just inherited the theatre from my uncle. You have a band. I have a place to play. Next week I got Devo unplugged and Crosby Stills Nash and Rotton. That's gonna suck. But hey, I'm just staring out. (CONTINUED)
That's fair.
How long have you guys been together?
Forever. Awhile, couple weeks decades, eons, a couple epochs. Thank the Mother it's almost the apocalypse. I hate time.
Do you have any music I can listen to?
That's not important. What is important is that you listen to me.
Um... Okay.
Do you scare easily?
Yes. Like right now when you asked, "Do you scare easily?" i think I just pissed a testicle. I'm kind of high strung.
Do you believe in the supernatural?
I think the more important question is: does it believe in me?
I'm serious.
So am I. I figure if I ignore the spooky shit, it will ignore me. we kind of formed a mutual non- interest pact.
Well, Mathias, someone just broke the pact. (CONTINUED)
I don't understand.
I'm just saying that spooky shit may happen. But don't worry. It'll all work out.

Don't worry? Saying, "Don't worry," to someone like me is like a cop saying, "Bend over, this is a cavity search!" I'm the king of the Fearheads! What's to worry about Aria? Are you a band of Satanic killers or something? Because if you are I want it on the record that I am not a virgin.
You seem like a nice guy. It's just that we attract a weird crowd. Things don't always follow a natural pattern with us.
Sounds like my sex life.
Really.
No, but I like to fantasize. MATHIAS watches Aria seductively suck on a pickle.
MATHIAS is on a giant plate, laying next to the french fr as ARIA'S giant hand picks him up and slides his body int her mouth.
Oh no stop! Help... Inside her mouth as she closes her lips around him.
(muffled) Oh hey this is nice... mmmmmmm!
(CONTINUED)

Ready to go back to the theatre. MATHIAS looks embarrassed and uncomfortable.
Um no I'm just going to sit here for a few minutes. If that's cool with you?
Suit yourself. ARIA exits. MATHIAS Squirms in his seat. And grabs an ice cube and drops it down his pants.

But...

um...I need coffee. MATHIAS runs up the stairs to his office and slams the do
